footer.orderThroughPartners: Order through our delivery partners for fast delivery across Poland.
footer.companyDescription: Authentic Turkish and Middle Eastern kebabs made with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes since 2016.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: We take pride in serving our customers

testimonial1.content: Absolutely the best kebab shop in town! Their Mixed Doner is mouth-watering, and the service is always friendly and quick.
testimonial1.author: Michael Johnson

testimonial2.content: I've tried kebabs from all over the city, but Super King Kebab stands out from the rest. Fresh ingredients and authentic flavors!
testimonial2.author: Sarah Williams

testimonial3.content: The chicken doner kebab is simply divine! I order at least once a week, and the quality is consistently excellent.
testimonial3.author: David Thompson

hero.title: Authentic Turkish Kebabs
hero.subtitle: Experience the rich flavors of traditional kebabs in Poland with Kebab Super King.

menuPage.title: Our Menu
menuPage.subtitle: Authentic kebabs and Middle Eastern cuisine prepared with fresh ingredients daily

dietaryInfo.title: Dietary Information
dietaryInfo.description: Ask our staff about allergens and dietary requirements. We can customize your order.

openingHours.title: Opening Hours
openingHours.description:
Monday to Thursday: 11:00 - 22:00
Friday to Sunday: 11:00 - 23:00

orderOnline.title: Order Online
orderOnline.description: Order directly through our delivery partners for fast and convenient delivery across Poland.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Kebab Super King was founded in 2010 with a vision to bring authentic Turkish cuisine to Poland. What began as a single location has now grown to over 40 restaurants across the country, serving thousands of satisfied customers daily.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our journey started with a passion for traditional recipes and cooking methods. We've maintained our commitment to authenticity and quality throughout our expansion, ensuring that every Kebab Super King location delivers the same exceptional experience.
ourStory.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to be one of Poland's favorite kebab restaurant chains, known for our consistent quality, generous portions, and friendly service across all our locations.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We stay true to traditional recipes and cooking methods, never compromising on the authentic taste.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only fresh ingredients, premium meats, and finest spices to create exceptional dishes.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in creating welcoming spaces where people can gather to enjoy great food.

freshIngredients.title: Fresh Ingredients
freshIngredients.description: We work with trusted suppliers to source the freshest vegetables, meats, and spices. Our ingredients are delivered daily to ensure maximum freshness.

trainedChefs.title: Trained Chefs
trainedChefs.description: Our chefs undergo rigorous training to master the art of kebab preparation. They follow traditional techniques to ensure authentic flavor in every dish.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: We maintain strict quality control standards across all locations to ensure consistency and excellence in every meal we serve.

customerSatisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
customerSatisfaction.description: Our top priority is your satisfaction. We value your feedback and continuously strive to improve our service and offerings.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive updates about new menu items, special promotions, and upcoming locations.
newsletter.terms: By subscribing, you agree to receive marketing communications from us. You can unsubscribe at any time.
newsletter.confirmation: You'll receive our next newsletter in your inbox.

homepage.bestSellersDescription: Discover our most popular kebabs that keep our customers coming back for more
homepage.promiseDescription: We use only the freshest ingredients, traditional recipes, and cooking methods to bring you the authentic taste of kebab royalty.
homepage.freshIngredientsDesc: Only the freshest and highest quality ingredients make it into our kebabs.
homepage.familyRecipeDesc: Our secret family recipes have been passed down through generations.
homepage.dailyFreshDesc: Every day we prepare our ingredients fresh for the best taste and quality.
homepage.findUsDescription: Visit one of our locations in these cities or order online for delivery
homepage.stayUpdatedDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter for special offers, new menu items, and exclusive events
homepage.privacyNote: We respect your privacy and never share your data.
